title: Redskins fire Jay Gruden - Emergency Podcast (Football 10/7)
description:
John Breech and Jason La Canfora react to the Redskins firing Jay Gruden following their 0-5 start to the season, the helplessness of the organization, who could be the next head coach in DC and what's next for Gruden. The guys also discuss Jay's brother Jon and the Raiders surprising start and Gardner Minshew as the QB of the Jaguars' future. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
